actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Agriculture Department.
Committee on Finance. Ordered favorably reported H.R. 3398 in lieu of this bill.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 regarding the public disclosure of certain manifest information.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to make available for public disclosure certain information contained in the manifests of cargo vessels arriving in the United States. Provides that such information shall not be made available for public disclosure if the Secretary of the Treasury makes a finding that disclosure will pose a threat of personal injury or property damage or such information must be kept secret for reasons of national defense or foreign policy. Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to establish procedures to provide access to such manifests.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 regarding the public disclosure of certain manifest information.
